@narendramodi @PIB_Panaji @DDNewsPanaji @COVIDNewsByMIB @airnews_mumbai @goacm @DrPramodPSawant @PMOIndia @PIB_India @MoHFW_INDIA @mansukhmandviya @OfficeOf_MM @dip_goa We conducted special #TikaUtsav for people who had difficulties in reaching vaccination centres, we also arranged transportation facilities for such people - Goa's Sweety S. tells Prime Minister @narendramodi https://t.co/vjDKNcUvTW
text_en: We conducted special for people who had difficulties in reaching vaccination centres, we also arranged transportation facilities for such people - Goa's Sweety S. tells Prime Minister

tweet_text: @narendramodi @PIB_Panaji @DDNewsPanaji @COVIDNewsByMIB @airnews_mumbai @goacm @DrPramodPSawant We took #TikaUtsav to every village of Goa, we celebrated the vaccine festival multiple times, we made walk-in #COVID19 vaccination and on-the-spot registration easy, all departments, doctors, nurses and field officers worked in coordination to achieve our targets - @goacm
